wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Young (born 3 May 1991) is a British Paralympic swimmer. He represented Britain at the 2012 London Paralympics and has won medals at both the long course and short course World Championships.

* Thomas Young (theologian) (1587–1655), Scottish Presbyterian and author
